page.title: 06ECOLOGY
page.content: The study area is comprised mainly of gently undulating, intensively managed arable land.{The Croome Estate}and disused airfield have conspicuously strong influences on the area. Hedgerows are mainly low cut with{elm {suckers, hawthorn, ash}and{field maple dominant. Associated plant species noted include{red and white campion, {white bryony}and{old man's beard amongst many other common species. Few mature hedgerow trees were noted but where present were mainly of{oak}and {ash.}There was some evidence in parts of hedgerow removal. Areas of particular ecological interest are composed mainly of small pockets of rough ground containing a very varied flora - this influences the variety of animal life (especially conspicuous being{Lepidoptera}and other{insects).}Examples observed
